message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $150 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $130 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $142 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product.
I'm glad we're close to a deal! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need $138 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $132 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $134.
I'm getting close to walking away, but I really want this product. I'm willing to pay $130 for it, that's my final offer.
I've made some concessions already, and I'm not willing to go any lower than this. I'll sell the product to you for $131.
I'm sorry, but I've already decided that $130 is my maximum budget. I'm going to have to walk away if we can't meet at that price.
